duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform plumbing repairs including leak location, water heater repairs, water filtration, plumbing fixtures, drain cleaning, and drain line replacement.
Provide excellent customer service and diagnose plumbing issues while effectively selling repair solutions to the customer.
Use iPad and Service Titan software to manage plumbing tasks and documentation.
Train and guide apprentice plumbers in the field.

education_certification.credential: Tradesman, Journeyman, or Masters Plumbing License
Valid driver's license with no major violations within the last 3 years
